name: protein-design-skills
description: Claude Code skills for computational protein design - backbone generation, sequence design, structure prediction, and experimental validation

plugins.name: adaptyv
plugins.description: All 21 protein design skills

plugins.name: design-tools
plugins.description: Core protein design methods (BoltzGen, BindCraft, RFdiffusion, etc.)

plugins.name: evaluation
plugins.description: Metrics, filtering, and quality control

plugins.name: utilities
plugins.description: Database access, structure utilities, setup

plugins.name: experimental
plugins.description: Experimental validation workflows

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: End-to-end workflows and pipeline management

plugins.name: boltzgen
plugins.description: All-atom protein design using BoltzGen diffusion model

plugins.name: bindcraft
plugins.description: End-to-end binder design using BindCraft hallucination

plugins.name: rfdiffusion
plugins.description: Generate protein backbones using RFdiffusion

plugins.name: proteinmpnn
plugins.description: Design protein sequences using ProteinMPNN inverse folding

plugins.name: ligandmpnn
plugins.description: Ligand-aware protein sequence design using LigandMPNN

plugins.name: solublempnn
plugins.description: Solubility-optimized protein sequence design using SolubleMPNN

plugins.name: chai
plugins.description: Structure prediction using Chai-1

plugins.name: boltz
plugins.description: Structure prediction using Boltz-1/Boltz-2

plugins.name: alphafold
plugins.description: Validate protein designs using AlphaFold2 structure prediction

plugins.name: esm
plugins.description: ESM2 protein language model for embeddings and sequence scoring

plugins.name: protein-qc
plugins.description: Quality control metrics and filtering thresholds for protein design

plugins.name: ipsae
plugins.description: Binder design ranking using ipSAE

plugins.name: pdb
plugins.description: Fetch and analyze protein structures from RCSB PDB

plugins.name: uniprot
plugins.description: Access UniProt for protein sequence and annotation retrieval

plugins.name: foldseek
plugins.description: Structure similarity search with Foldseek

plugins.name: setup
plugins.description: First-time setup for protein design tools

plugins.name: cell-free-expression
plugins.description: Guidance for cell-free protein synthesis (CFPS) optimization

plugins.name: binding-characterization

plugins.description: End-to-end guidance for protein design pipelines
